Personal Information

Name: Youssef Chaker

Country of Birth: Lebanon

Date of Birth: June 7th 1986 (Gemini)

Height: 6’2’’ (about 1.87 meters)

Weight: 215 Lb (about 97 Kg)

Places of Residence: Charlottesville, VA. USA (2005 – present), Fairfax, VA. USA (2004 – 2005), Beirut, Lebanon (1986 – 2004)

First Love: Music: Rap, Hip Hop, Techno, Trance, House, Jazz, International, Classical. Listed not in particular order, depending on the day I might be loving one genre more than the rest.

Second Love: Computers: I cannot stay away from computers. I am very attached to technology and fascinated by these little boxes that do so much! I currently own four computers, yes i said (4). One desktop running Vista (yikes!) and Ubuntu (yay!), one laptop running Ubuntu, one tablet running XP (it’s ok) and one MacBook running OS X Leopard (amazing!). Many flavors as you can see, a bit of everything. And always one computer hooked up with a dual monitor setup.

Sports: I play BasketBall and FootBall (the one where you actually kick the ball with your foot!) and love to follow FootBall (the American one), Tennis, Formula1, and all College sports.

Club Teams: Lakers, Broncos, Dodgers, Red Wings, UVA Cavaliers (plus Duke BasketBall, don’t ask!), Manchester Utd, Sagesse (7ikmeh).

International Teams: Lebanese National Team (any time), Team USA (sometimes :P), Germany (in the FIFA World Cup and FIFA Euro Cup)

Athletes: Kobe Bryant (don’t care what you think!), LeBron James, Rafael Nadal, Michael Schumacher, David Beckham, John Elway.
